Subject: Board Game Design
Description: What does it take to design and produce a new game? We will discuss all aspects, from initial concept and mechanics to playtesting and even funding through Kickstarter. This is a Q&A panel so bring your questions!  Speakers include:Matthew Duhan, Matt Arnold - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Titans of Industry
Description:
In Titans of Industry, you must invest in building factories and businesses (in the 1920's) in order to produce goods to gain victory points (VPs). Game play involves a delicate balance of money, production, and goals. The person who can best manage his buildings and meet his goals in seven years will win.
  Speakers include:Matthew Duhan - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 2 hours and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Mystery Spatula Theatre 11
Description: Mystery Spatula Theater 11, or MST11 for short, is our own fan version of the popular television show Mystery Science Theater 3000. Although more fromage than homage, the MST11 crew still have fun doing what the 'big boys' do.  Speakers include:Matthew Duhan - Track: Film  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector, Sound System
